channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Watch Active2 PlugIn
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Watch Active2 PlugIn

item.title: CVE-2021-25423|2024-08-03T20:03:05.619Z -- samsung%20mobile -- watch%20active2%20plugin
item.description: Improper log management vulnerability in Watch Active2 PlugIn prior to 2.2.08.21033151 version allows attacker with log permissions to leak Wi-Fi password connected to the user smartphone via log.

item.title: CVE-2022-25829|2024-08-03T04:49:44.177Z -- samsung%20mobile -- watch%20active2%20plugin
item.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Watch Active2 Plugin prior to version 2.2.08.22012751 allows attacker to access password information of connected WiFiAp in the log
